name: accuGPS
tag_list: gps-tracking-india, gps-tracking-devices-india, gps-tracking-system-india, child-locator, child-tracking, accu-gps, accugps, vehicle-tracking, gps-tracking
overview:
accuGPS develops and markets high quality GPS tracking devices for personal, asset and vehicle protection and security.

The company has launched it’s first tracker - GT365 that uses sophisticated GPS and AGPS technology to accurately pin point it’s location anywhere in the world. Unlike traditional GPS devices, accuGPS devices can be tracked on-demand through SMS on virtually any mobile network around the world.

The devices manufactured by accuGPS sport extra long battery life of up to 6 days, are water resistant, tamper proof and accurate upto 10 metres.

The company is based in Surat, Gujarat with marketing offices in Bangalore and Delhi.

milestones.description: accuGPS announces the launch of it's first high performance personal GPS device - the GT365
